author: zinkk757
title: 9 this set rules
review:
i love this set.  it has all you need for an explorers day at the beach. i like the figures as well.  i think that the trailer should have been gray and had the grey bricks instead.  

pros: great figures great playability nice truck cool labels nice boat

cons: it would be cooler if it had a grey trailer like the older truck sets from 1995 and 1994

overall:great set 9 get it if you can

author: jman
title: A Fun Set........Almost Perfect (4.5)
review: This is a fun set and the only road vehicle for the diver series. Gives you 2 minifigs which is nice so one can drive the truck and dinghy while the other one dives. The truck has those cool side panels and off-road tires. The only things (I think) missing is an antennae on the truck roof and a bar on the front of the truck to make it look more off-road like (which I added with a black plate with handle and those lever antennae's).

author: mrmitch
title: Cool set - truck and trailer with raft.
review: You can't beat this set for the money it has a trailer with raft, truck to store your gear and two neat mini fig. with extra stuff. If you come across this set it would make a great addition to any town.

author: hustla187
title: sweet Van
review: The van in this set is like awesome!It is also even better with a trailer, a boat, and 2 figs. In my opinion, this is a good set to get. I can't say nothing bad about this set. Go out there and get that set before it is gone for good!

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Town (Divers) - Scuba Squad Review
review:
This is a great model to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

The instruction of this set has 12 pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

This set has lot's of useful pieces which you can use for future MOC's (My own creations) and/or brickfilms for sure.

Minifigures

The minifigs we get in this set are very cool as well. The driver has a white shirt with some cool markings and he also got blue pants, a blue cap and black shades. The diver has black pants, a blue uniform, a black helmet and a black beard.

The build

The build is very nice and easy and we also get a few stickers with this set.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/6556-1.jpg[/img]


This set comes with lot's of stuff: We get a motorboat, a trailer and the truck. The trailer can be removed very easily and the ceiling and the doors of the truck can be opened very nice and easy as well. There's also a trunk on the back of the truck where the figures can store the diving gear.

Summary

All in all this set is an great set and I would HIGHLY recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de

Stopmotion 4

Review

author: wipefeetnmat
title: My only divers set..
review:
This is my only Divers theme set and I am very pleased with it. It has good figures and vehicles. It has a lot of playability because the driver can drive the boat or van while the diver can go diving or fix the bouy(if that is how you spell it.)

     Here are some Pros and Cons:

Pros: Good mini figures, good vehicles, and a lot of playability.

Cons: Should include a shark or a ray.
